08-06-2009, 09:13 PM #1 CherokeeParker View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2007 Posts 14,091 ~Green Works Laundry Detergent~$3.00 Off Coupon~Plus Money-Back Guarantee~ ~Green Works Laundry Detergent~$3.00 Off Coupon~Plus Money-Back Guarantee~
From your kitchen to your bathroom, our line of natural products cleans with the power you expect from Clorox. And because they are made with plant and mineral-based cleaning ingredients they leave no harsh chemical fumes or residue. After all, everyone deserves a clean, pleasant home.
http://www.greenworkscleaners.com/savings/
$3.00 OFF Green Works any Green Works Laundry Detergent Purchase
~Money-Back Guarantee~
http://www.greenworkscleaners.com/pdf/GW_HDL_MBG_FORM.pdf
Green Works Natural Laundry Detergent Money-Back Guarantee. Offer is available on Green Works Natural Laundry Detergent only. Participating Product must be purchased between July 1, 2009 and December 31, 2009 (Promotion Period). 1. Purchase one bottle of Green Works Natural Laundry Detergent in a single transaction during the Promotion Period.
2. If youre not completely satisfied, complete the online money-back guarantee form at www.greenworkscleaners.com and print. 3. Include the reason for your return and the 10-digit UPC bar code(s) from the Participating Product on the form. 4. Include the original cash register receipt. Receipts must clearly show store name, store address, purchase date and product purchased. 5. Mail all items together in an envelope with appropriate postage postmarked by January 31, 2010, and received by February 15, 2010. Green Works Laundry MBG P.O. Box 5013 Kalamazoo, MI 49003-5013
